progassign1

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • progassign1.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends java.lang.Object
    The Vertex class represents a vertex within a two-dimensional unit square.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double x 
      double y 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vertex(double x, double y)
      The constructor sets the coordinates of the vertex and initializes the ArrayList of vertices connected to this vertex.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(Vertex v)
      The equals method checks to see if this vertex is the same as another one buy seeing if they have the same coordinates.
      Vertex getClosest()
      The getClosest method determines and returns the vertex to which this vertex is closest based on edge weight.
      java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> getConnectedVertices()
      The getConnectedVertices is a simple accessor for the connectedVertices field.
      double getEdgeWeight(Vertex otherVertex)
      The getEdgeWeight method determines the Euclidean distance between this vertex and a specified other vertex.
      double getSmallestEdge()
      The getSmallestEdge method determines the lowest weight edge to which this vertex is connected.
      void makeConnections(java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> graph)
      The makeConnections method connects this vertex with all other vertexes in the given ArrayList of vertices.
      void removeConnection(Vertex v)
      The removeConnection method removes a specified vertex from the list of vertices to which this vertex is connected.

      • Vertex

        public Vertex(double x,
      double y)
        The constructor sets the coordinates of the vertex and initializes the ArrayList of vertices connected to this vertex.
        Parameters:
        x - A double representing the vertex's location along the x-axis.
        y - A double representing the vertex's location along the y-axis.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnectedVertices

        public java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> getConnectedVertices()
        The getConnectedVertices is a simple accessor for the connectedVertices field.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList representing the connectedVertices field.

      • removeConnection

        public void removeConnection(Vertex v)
        The removeConnection method removes a specified vertex from the list of vertices to which this vertex is connected.
        Parameters:
        v - The vertex to be removed.

      • getClosest

        public Vertex getClosest()
        The getClosest method determines and returns the vertex to which this vertex is closest based on edge weight.
        Returns:
        The vertex closest to this one.

      • getEdgeWeight

        public double getEdgeWeight(Vertex otherVertex)
        The getEdgeWeight method determines the Euclidean distance between this vertex and a specified other vertex.
        Parameters:
        otherVertex - The Vertex object whose distance away from the Vertex is to be determined.
        Returns:
        A double representing the edge weight between this vertex and the specified other vertex.

      • getSmallestEdge

        public double getSmallestEdge()
        The getSmallestEdge method determines the lowest weight edge to which this vertex is connected.
        Returns:
        A double representing the weight of the smallest edge.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Vertex v)
        The equals method checks to see if this vertex is the same as another one buy seeing if they have the same coordinates.
        Parameters:
        v - A specified Vertex object.
        Returns:
        A boolean stating whether or not the two vertices are equal.

      • makeConnections

        public void makeConnections(java.util.ArrayList<Vertex> graph)
        The makeConnections method connects this vertex with all other vertexes in the given ArrayList of vertices. This is done since all graphs in the assignment are complete.
        Parameters:
        graph - An ArrayList of vertices representing the graph in which this vertex is located.
